Symbol.Script_3D:
if gs_detlevel_3D_m=0 then end ! Off
pen gs_cont_pen material gs_gutter_hl_mat
if gs_shadow=0 then SHADOW OFF if gs_shadow=1 then SHADOW ON
if gs_detlevel_3D_m=1 or (GLOB_CONTEXT>20 and GLOB_CONTEXT<40) then ! Simple gs_gutter_hl_guard = 0 gs_resol=3 endif
resol gs_resol
! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! TYPE 1 ! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- if gs_gutter_hl_type_m=1 then
addy -gs_gutter_bb
addx gs_gutter_aa rotz 45 roty 90 cutplane del 3
addx -gs_gutter_aa rotz -45 roty -90 cutplane del 3
muly (HL_Width-2*gs_gutter_aa)/2/0.07 mulz HL_Height/0.22 addx -(HL_Width+0.2)/2 rotz 90 rotx 90 ! --- FRONT SIDE --- extrude 5, 0,0,HL_Width+0.2, 12+36, -0.07, 0.22, 0, -0.07, 0.2, 0, -0.04, 0.2, 0, 0, 0.05, 0, 0, 0, 0
del 5 cutend cutend
del 1
for kk=1 to 2 addx -gs_gutter_aa
addy -gs_gutter_bb rotz -45 roty 90 cutplane del 3
addY gs_gutter_bb mulx (HL_Width-2*gs_gutter_aa)/2/0.07 mulz HL_Height/0.22 rotx 90 ! --- REAR SIDE --- extrude 5, 0,0,(HL_Width-2*gs_gutter_aa)/2+gs_gutter_bb*2+0.2, 12+36, -0.07, 0.22, 0, -0.07, 0.2, 0, -0.04, 0.2, 0, 0, 0.05, 0, 0, 0, 0
del 4 cutend del 1 mul -1,1,1 next kk del 2
addy gs_gutter_bb rotx 90 for tt=1 to 2 ! --- BACK SIDE --- addx -gs_gutter_aa mulx (HL_Width-2*gs_gutter_aa)/2/0.07 muly HL_Height/0.22 POLY_ 7, -0.07, 0.22, 0, -0.07, 0.2, 0, -0.04, 0.2, 0, 0, 0.05, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0.22, 1
del 3 roty 180
next tt del 2
POLY_ 4, gs_gutter_aa, 0, 0, gs_gutter_aa, HL_Height, 1, -gs_gutter_aa, HL_Height, 0, -gs_gutter_aa, 0, 1
del 2
endif
! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! TYPE 2 ! -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
if gs_gutter_hl_type_m=2 then
addy -gs_gutter_bb
addx gs_gutter_aa rotz 45 roty 90 cutplane del 3
addx -gs_gutter_aa rotz -45 roty -90 cutplane del 3
muly (HL_Width-2*gs_gutter_aa)/2/0.1 mulz HL_Height/0.22 addx -(HL_Width+0.2)/2 rotz 90 rotx 90 ! --- FRONT SIDE --- extrude 12, 0,0,HL_Width+0.2, 12+36, -0.1, 0.22, 1, -0.1, 0.1955555555556, 1, -0.07554938271605, 0.1955555555556, 900, 0, 91.28749142835, 4001, -0.075, 0.1711111111111, 1, -0.07445061728395, 0.1466666666667, 900, 0, -91.28749142835, 4001, -0.05, 0.1466666666667, 1, -0.05, 0.07333333333333, 1, -0.08156226009495, -0.001898510670799, 900, 0, -65.90690755747, 4001, 9.00131507758E-032, 1.438736282888E-015, 1
del 5 cutend cutend
del 1
for kk=1 to 2 addx -gs_gutter_aa
addy -gs_gutter_bb rotz -45 roty 90 cutplane del 3
addY gs_gutter_bb mulx (HL_Width-2*gs_gutter_aa)/2/0.1 mulz HL_Height/0.22 rotx 90 ! --- REAR SIDE --- extrude 12, 0,0,(HL_Width-2*gs_gutter_aa)/2+gs_gutter_bb*2+0.2, 12+36, -0.1, 0.22, 1, -0.1, 0.1955555555556, 1, -0.07554938271605, 0.1955555555556, 900, 0, 91.28749142835, 4001, -0.075, 0.1711111111111, 1, -0.07445061728395, 0.1466666666667, 900, 0, -91.28749142835, 4001, -0.05, 0.1466666666667, 1, -0.05, 0.07333333333333, 1, -0.08156226009495, -0.001898510670799, 900, 0, -65.90690755747, 4001, 9.00131507758E-032, 1.438736282888E-015, 1
del 4 cutend del 1 mul -1,1,1 next kk del 2
addy gs_gutter_bb rotx 90 for tt=1 to 2 ! --- BACK SIDE --- addx -gs_gutter_aa mulx (HL_Width-2*gs_gutter_aa)/2/0.1 muly HL_Height/0.22 POLY_ 14, -0.1, 0.22, 1, -0.1, 0.1955555555556, 1, -0.07554938271605, 0.1955555555556, 900, 0, 91.28749142835, 4001, -0.075, 0.1711111111111, 1, -0.07445061728395, 0.1466666666667, 900, 0, -91.28749142835, 4001, -0.05, 0.1466666666667, 1, -0.05, 0.07333333333333, 1, -0.08156226009495, -0.001898510670799, 900, 0, -65.90690755747, 4001, 9.00131507758E-032, 1.438736282888E-015, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0.22, 1
del 3 roty 180
next tt del 2
POLY_ 4, gs_gutter_aa, 0, 0, gs_gutter_aa, HL_Height, 1, -gs_gutter_aa, HL_Height, 0, -gs_gutter_aa, 0, 1
del 2 endif
! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! TYPE 3 ! -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
if gs_gutter_hl_type_m=3 then
addy -gs_gutter_bb
addx gs_gutter_aa rotz 45 roty 90 cutplane del 3
addx -gs_gutter_aa rotz -45 roty -90 cutplane del 3
muly (HL_Width-2*gs_gutter_aa)/2/0.1 mulz HL_Height/0.22 addx -(HL_Width+0.2)/2 rotz 90 rotx 90 ! --- FRONT SIDE --- extrude 10, 0,0,HL_Width+0.2, 12+36, -0.1, 0.22, 1, -0.1, 0.1833333333333, 1, -0.08666666666667, 0.1833333333333, 1, -0.05, 0.1833333333333, 900, 0, 90, 4001, -0.05, 0.1466666666667, 1, -0.05, 0.07333333333333, 1, -0.08156226009495, -0.001898510670799, 900, 0, -65.90690755748, 4001, -1.387778780781E-017, -2.831936074532E-015, 1
del 5 cutend cutend
del 1
for kk=1 to 2 addx -gs_gutter_aa
addy -gs_gutter_bb rotz -45 roty 90 cutplane del 3
addY gs_gutter_bb mulx (HL_Width-2*gs_gutter_aa)/2/0.1 mulz HL_Height/0.22 rotx 90 ! --- REAR SIDE --- extrude 10, 0,0,(HL_Width-2*gs_gutter_aa)/2+gs_gutter_bb*2+0.2, 12+36, -0.1, 0.22, 1, -0.1, 0.1833333333333, 1, -0.08666666666667, 0.1833333333333, 1, -0.05, 0.1833333333333, 900, 0, 90, 4001, -0.05, 0.1466666666667, 1, -0.05, 0.07333333333333, 1, -0.08156226009495, -0.001898510670799, 900, 0, -65.90690755748, 4001, -1.387778780781E-017, -2.831936074532E-015, 1
del 4 cutend del 1 mul -1, 1, 1 next kk del 2
addy gs_gutter_bb rotx 90 for tt=1 to 2 !!*** BACK Side addx -gs_gutter_aa mulx (HL_Width-2*gs_gutter_aa)/2/0.1 muly HL_Height/0.22 POLY_ 12, -0.1, 0.22, 1, -0.1, 0.1833333333333, 1, -0.08666666666667, 0.1833333333333, 1, -0.05, 0.1833333333333, 900, 0, 90, 4001, -0.05, 0.1466666666667, 1, -0.05, 0.07333333333333, 1, -0.08156226009495, -0.001898510670799, 900, 0, -65.90690755748, 4001, -1.387778780781E-017, -2.831936074532E-015, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0.22, 1
del 3 roty 180
next tt del 2
POLY_ 4, gs_gutter_aa, 0, 0, gs_gutter_aa, HL_Height, 1, -gs_gutter_aa, HL_Height, 0, -gs_gutter_aa, 0, 1
del 2 endif
! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! TYPE 4 ! -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
if gs_gutter_hl_type_m=4 then
addy -gs_gutter_bb
addx gs_gutter_aa rotz 45 roty 90 cutplane del 3
addx -gs_gutter_aa rotz -45 roty -90 cutplane del 3
muly (HL_Width-2*gs_gutter_aa)/2/0.1 mulz HL_Height/0.22 addx -(HL_Width+0.2)/2 rotz 90 rotx 90 ! --- FONT SIDE --- extrude 13, 0,0,HL_Width+0.2, 12+36, 7.92392346591E-019, 0, 1, 7.92392346591E-019, 0.01294117647059, 1, 0.008244657413527, 0.0459198061247, 900, 0, -63.91445077671, 4001, -0.025, 0.03882352941176, 1, -0.05, 0.1423529411765, 1, -0.084941643324, 0.1336175303455, 900, 0, 59.94057535157, 4001, -0.075, 0.1682352941176, 1, -0.075, 0.1682352941176, 1, -0.075, 0.1941176470588, 1, -0.1, 0.1941176470588, 1, -0.1, 0.22, 1
del 5 cutend cutend
del 1
for kk=1 to 2 addx -gs_gutter_aa
addy -gs_gutter_bb rotz -45 roty 90 cutplane del 3
addY gs_gutter_bb mulx (HL_Width-2*gs_gutter_aa)/2/0.1 mulz HL_Height/0.22 rotx 90 ! --- REAR SIDE --- extrude 13, 0,0,(HL_Width-2*gs_gutter_aa)/2+gs_gutter_bb*2+0.2, 12+36, 7.92392346591E-019, 0, 1, 7.92392346591E-019, 0.01294117647059, 1, 0.008244657413527, 0.0459198061247, 900, 0, -63.91445077671, 4001, -0.025, 0.03882352941176, 1, -0.05, 0.1423529411765, 1, -0.084941643324, 0.1336175303455, 900, 0, 59.94057535157, 4001, -0.075, 0.1682352941176, 1, -0.075, 0.1682352941176, 1, -0.075, 0.1941176470588, 1, -0.1, 0.1941176470588, 1, -0.1, 0.22, 1
del 4 cutend del 1 mul -1,1,1 next kk del 2
addy gs_gutter_bb rotx 90 for tt=1 to 2 ! --- BACK SIDE --- addx -gs_gutter_aa mulx (HL_Width-2*gs_gutter_aa)/2/0.1 muly HL_Height/0.22 POLY_ 15, 7.92392346591E-019, 0, 1, 7.92392346591E-019, 0.01294117647059, 1, 0.008244657413527, 0.0459198061247, 900, 0, -63.91445077671, 4001, -0.025, 0.03882352941176, 1, -0.05, 0.1423529411765, 1, -0.084941643324, 0.1336175303455, 900, 0, 59.94057535157, 4001, -0.075, 0.1682352941176, 1, -0.075, 0.1682352941176, 1, -0.075, 0.1941176470588, 1, -0.1, 0.1941176470588, 1, -0.1, 0.22, 1, 0, 0.22, 0, 0, 0, 0
del 3 roty 180
next tt del 2
POLY_ 4, gs_gutter_aa, 0, 0, gs_gutter_aa, HL_Height, 1, -gs_gutter_aa, HL_Height, 0, -gs_gutter_aa, 0, 1
del 2
endif
! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! TYPE 5 ! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- if gs_gutter_hl_type_m=5 then
addy -gs_gutter_bb
addx gs_gutter_aa rotz 45 roty 90 cutplane del 3
addx -gs_gutter_aa rotz -45 roty -90 cutplane del 3
muly (HL_Width-2*gs_gutter_aa)/2/0.1 mulz HL_Height/0.28 addx -(HL_Width+0.2)/2 rotz 90 rotx 90 ! --- FRONT SIDE --- extrude 16, 0,0,HL_Width+0.2, 12+36, 7.210679017578E-019, 0, 1, 7.210679017578E-019, 0.01217391304348, 1, -0.02, 0.01217391304348, 1, -0.02, 0.07935170807453, 900, 0, -116.7279280027, 4001, -0.08, 0.1095652173913, 1, -0.1357619600717, 0.1488633241934, 900, 0, 93.55787439852, 4001, -0.1, 0.2069565217391, 1, -0.1, 0.2313043478261, 1, -0.1060869565217, 0.2313043478261, 1, -0.1060869565217, 0.2434782608696, 900, 0, -180, 4001, -0.1060869565217, 0.255652173913, 1, -0.1, 0.255652173913, 1, -0.1, 0.28, 1
del 5 cutend cutend
del 1
for kk=1 to 2 addx -gs_gutter_aa
addy -gs_gutter_bb rotz -45 roty 90 cutplane del 3
addY gs_gutter_bb mulx (HL_Width-2*gs_gutter_aa)/2/0.1 mulz HL_Height/0.28 rotx 90 ! --- REAR SIDE --- extrude 16, 0,0,(HL_Width-2*gs_gutter_aa)/2+gs_gutter_bb*2+0.2, 12+36, 7.210679017578E-019, 0, 1, 7.210679017578E-019, 0.01217391304348, 1, -0.02, 0.01217391304348, 1, -0.02, 0.07935170807453, 900, 0, -116.7279280027, 4001, -0.08, 0.1095652173913, 1, -0.1357619600717, 0.1488633241934, 900, 0, 93.55787439852, 4001, -0.1, 0.2069565217391, 1, -0.1, 0.2313043478261, 1, -0.1060869565217, 0.2313043478261, 1, -0.1060869565217, 0.2434782608696, 900, 0, -180, 4001, -0.1060869565217, 0.255652173913, 1, -0.1, 0.255652173913, 1, -0.1, 0.28, 1
del 4 cutend del 1 mul -1,1,1 next kk del 2
addy gs_gutter_bb rotx 90 for tt=1 to 2 !!*** BACK Side addx -gs_gutter_aa mulx (HL_Width-2*gs_gutter_aa)/2/0.1 muly HL_Height/0.28 POLY_ 18, 07.210679017578E-019, 0, 1, 07.210679017578E-019, 0.01217391304348, 1, -0.02, 0.01217391304348, 1, -0.02, 0.07935170807453, 900, 0, -116.7279280027, 4001, -0.08, 0.1095652173913, 1, -0.1357619600717, 0.1488633241934, 900, 0, 93.55787439852, 4001, -0.1, 0.2069565217391, 1, -0.1, 0.2313043478261, 1, -0.1060869565217, 0.2313043478261, 1, -0.1060869565217, 0.2434782608696, 900, 0, -180, 4001, -0.1060869565217, 0.255652173913, 1, -0.1, 0.255652173913, 1, -0.1, 0.28, 1, 0, 0.28, 0, 0, 0, 1
del 3 roty 180
next tt del 2
POLY_ 4, gs_gutter_aa, 0, 0, gs_gutter_aa, HL_Height, 1, -gs_gutter_aa, HL_Height, 0, -gs_gutter_aa, 0, 1
del 2 endif
! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Downspout Profile ! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- CALL "m_DSProfiles" PARAMETERS gs_gutter_ds_profile_num=gs_gutter_ds_profile_num, gs_mask=0, gs_gutter_aa=gs_gutter_aa, gs_gutter_bb=gs_gutter_bb, gs_gutter_dd=gs_gutter_dd
if gs_gutter_ds_profile_num=1 then ! Round POLY_ 5+nsp/3, -gs_gutter_aa,-gs_gutter_bb,1, gs_gutter_aa,-gs_gutter_bb,1, gs_gutter_aa,gs_gutter_bb,1, -gs_gutter_aa,gs_gutter_bb,1, -gs_gutter_aa,-gs_gutter_bb,-1, use (nsp) endif
if gs_gutter_ds_profile_num=3 then ! Corrugated POLY_ 5+nsp/3, -gs_gutter_aa, -gs_gutter_bb, 1, gs_gutter_aa, -gs_gutter_bb, 1, gs_gutter_aa, gs_gutter_bb, 1, -gs_gutter_aa, gs_gutter_bb, 1, -gs_gutter_aa, -gs_gutter_bb, -1, get (nsp) endif
! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Head Leader Guard ! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- if gs_gutter_hl_guard = 1 then ww=0.002 ! guard wire width hx1=0.023 ! hole width - planned nx=INT(HL_Width/0.025) ! guard x number of holes hy1=0.023 ! hole depth - planned ny=INT(HL_Depth/0.025) ! guard y number of holes
add HL_Width/2,gs_gutter_bb,HL_Height material gs_gutter_guard_mat for j=1 to nx+1 if j > 1 then plane 4, 0, 0, 0, 0.002, 0, 0, 0.002, -HL_Depth, 0, 0, -HL_Depth, 0 endif addx -0.025 next j del nx+1
for j=1 to ny+1 if j > 1 then plane 4, 0, 0, 0, -HL_Width, 0, 0, -HL_Width, 0.002, 0, 0, 0.002, 0 endif addy -0.025 next j del ny+1 del 1 endif
! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! HOTSPOT ! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- unID=gs_unID
if gs_gutter_ds_profile_num=1 then !!(Round) gs_gutter_temp=gs_gutter_dd else gs_gutter_temp=gs_gutter_bb endif
! --- Head Leader Width --- add 0,gs_gutter_temp,HL_Height HOTSPOT 0, 0, 0, unID, HL_Width2, 1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -1, 0, 0, unID, HL_Width2, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT HL_Width2, 0, 0, unID, HL_Width2, 2 : unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT 0, 0, 0, unID, HL_Width2, 1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 1, 0, 0, unID, HL_Width2, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -HL_Width2, 0, 0, unID, HL_Width2, 2 : unID=unID+1 del 1
! --- Head Leader Depth --- add HL_Width/2,gs_gutter_temp, HL_Height HOTSPOT 0, 0, 0, unID, HL_Depth, 1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0, 1, 0, unID, HL_Depth, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0, -HL_Depth, 0, unID, HL_Depth, 2 : unID=unID+1 del 1
add -HL_Width/2,gs_gutter_temp, HL_Height HOTSPOT 0, 0, 0, unID, HL_Depth, 1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0, 1, 0, unID, HL_Depth, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0, -HL_Depth, 0, unID, HL_Depth, 2 : unID=unID+1 del 1
if gs_HtpsMacro=0 then ! not used in Downspout Complex
! --- HEAD LEADER HEIGHT --- HOTSPOT 0, 0, 0, unID, HL_Height, 1+256 :unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0, 0, -1, unID, HL_Height, 3 :unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0, 0, HL_Height, unID, HL_Height, 2 :unID=unID+1
! --- DOWNSPOUTS ---
if gs_gutter_ds_profile_num=1 then ! Round ! --- ROUND --- ! --- WIDTH --- add 0,gs_gutter_dd,0 HOTSPOT 0, 0, 0, unID, gs_gutter_dd, 1+128, gs_gutter_dd2 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -1, 0, 0, unID, gs_gutter_dd, 3, gs_gutter_dd2 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT gs_gutter_dd, 0, 0, unID, gs_gutter_dd, 2, gs_gutter_dd2 : unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT 0, 0, 0, unID, gs_gutter_dd, 1+128, gs_gutter_dd2 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 1, 0, 0, unID, gs_gutter_dd, 3, gs_gutter_dd2 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -gs_gutter_dd, 0, 0, unID, gs_gutter_dd, 2, gs_gutter_dd2 : unID=unID+1 del 1 add 0,-gs_gutter_dd,0 HOTSPOT 0, 0, 0, unID, gs_gutter_dd, 1+128, gs_gutter_dd2 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -1, 0, 0, unID, gs_gutter_dd, 3, gs_gutter_dd2 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT gs_gutter_dd, 0, 0, unID, gs_gutter_dd, 2, gs_gutter_dd2 : unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT 0, 0, 0, unID, gs_gutter_dd, 1+128, gs_gutter_dd2 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 1, 0, 0, unID, gs_gutter_dd, 3, gs_gutter_dd2 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -gs_gutter_dd, 0, 0, unID, gs_gutter_dd, 2, gs_gutter_dd2 : unID=unID+1 del 1
! --- LENGTH --- add gs_gutter_dd,0,0 HOTSPOT 0, 0, 0, unID, gs_gutter_dd, 1+128, gs_gutter_dd2 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0, -1, 0, unID, gs_gutter_dd, 3, gs_gutter_dd2 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0, gs_gutter_dd, 0, unID, gs_gutter_dd, 2, gs_gutter_dd2 : unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT 0, 0, 0, unID, gs_gutter_dd, 1+128, gs_gutter_dd2 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0, 1, 0, unID, gs_gutter_dd, 3, gs_gutter_dd2 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0, -gs_gutter_dd, 0, unID, gs_gutter_dd, 2, gs_gutter_dd2 : unID=unID+1 del 1 add -gs_gutter_dd,0,0 HOTSPOT 0, 0, 0, unID, gs_gutter_dd, 1+128, gs_gutter_dd2 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0, -1, 0, unID, gs_gutter_dd, 3, gs_gutter_dd2 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0, gs_gutter_dd, 0, unID, gs_gutter_dd, 2, gs_gutter_dd2 : unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT 0, 0, 0, unID, gs_gutter_dd, 1+128, gs_gutter_dd2 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0, 1, 0, unID, gs_gutter_dd, 3, gs_gutter_dd2 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0, -gs_gutter_dd, 0, unID, gs_gutter_dd, 2, gs_gutter_dd2 : unID=unID+1 del 1
else ! --- Rectangle, Corrugated --- ! --- WIDTH --- add 0,gs_gutter_bb,0 HOTSPOT 0, 0, 0, unID, gs_gutter_aa, 1+128, gs_gutter_aa2 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -1, 0, 0, unID, gs_gutter_aa, 3, gs_gutter_aa2 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT gs_gutter_aa, 0, 0, unID, gs_gutter_aa, 2, gs_gutter_aa2 : unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT 0, 0, 0, unID, gs_gutter_aa, 1+128, gs_gutter_aa2 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 1, 0, 0, unID, gs_gutter_aa, 3, gs_gutter_aa2 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -gs_gutter_aa, 0, 0, unID, gs_gutter_aa, 2, gs_gutter_aa2 : unID=unID+1 del 1 add 0,-gs_gutter_bb,0 HOTSPOT 0, 0, 0, unID, gs_gutter_aa, 1+128, gs_gutter_aa2 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -1, 0, 0, unID, gs_gutter_aa, 3, gs_gutter_aa2 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT gs_gutter_aa, 0, 0, unID, gs_gutter_aa, 2, gs_gutter_aa2 : unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT 0, 0, 0, unID, gs_gutter_aa, 1+128, gs_gutter_aa2 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 1, 0, 0, unID, gs_gutter_aa, 3, gs_gutter_aa2 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -gs_gutter_aa, 0, 0, unID, gs_gutter_aa, 2, gs_gutter_aa2 : unID=unID+1 del 1
! --- LENGTH --- add gs_gutter_aa,0,0 HOTSPOT 0, 0, 0, unID, gs_gutter_bb, 1+128, gs_gutter_bb2 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0, -1, 0, unID, gs_gutter_bb, 3, gs_gutter_bb2 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0, gs_gutter_bb, 0, unID, gs_gutter_bb, 2, gs_gutter_bb2 : unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT 0, 0, 0, unID, gs_gutter_bb, 1+128, gs_gutter_bb2 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0, 1, 0, unID, gs_gutter_bb, 3, gs_gutter_bb2 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0, -gs_gutter_bb, 0, unID, gs_gutter_bb, 2, gs_gutter_bb2 : unID=unID+1 del 1 add -gs_gutter_aa,0,0 HOTSPOT 0, 0, 0, unID, gs_gutter_bb, 1+128, gs_gutter_bb2 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0, -1, 0, unID, gs_gutter_bb, 3, gs_gutter_bb2 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0, gs_gutter_bb, 0, unID, gs_gutter_bb, 2, gs_gutter_bb2 : unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT 0, 0, 0, unID, gs_gutter_bb, 1+128, gs_gutter_bb2 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0, 1, 0, unID, gs_gutter_bb, 3, gs_gutter_bb2 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0, -gs_gutter_bb, 0, unID, gs_gutter_bb, 2, gs_gutter_bb2 : unID=unID+1 del 1
endif endif
Symbol.Script_2D:
pen gs_cont_pen line_type gs_line_type fill gs_fill_type
! ***************************************************************************** ! Head Leader ! *****************************************************************************
ACCUTPLANEHEIGHT = (GLOB_CSTORY_ELEV+GLOB_CUTPLANES_INFO [1]) - vertical_offset
if gs_gutter_ds_profile_num=1 then ! Round gs_gutter_temp=gs_gutter_dd else gs_gutter_temp=gs_gutter_bb endif
! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! FOOR PLAN DISPLAY TYPE ! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Projected ! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- if iFloorPlanDisplayType = DISPLAY_PROJECTED then if ACCUTPLANEHEIGHT < 0 then end else line_type gs_line_type add2 -HL_Width/2, -HL_Depth+gs_gutter_temp poly2_b 5, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0, 0, 1, HL_Width, 0, 1, HL_Width, HL_Depth, 1, 0, HL_Depth, 1, 0, 0, -1 del 1 endif endif
! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Projected With Overhead ! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- if ifloorPlanDisplayType = DISPLAY_OVERHEAD_PROJ then
if ACCUTPLANEHEIGHT < 0 then line_type overhead_line_type _frame_fill = 1+4 else line_type gs_line_type _frame_fill = 1+2+4+64 endif
add2 -HL_Width/2, -HL_Depth+gs_gutter_temp poly2_b 5, _frame_fill, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0, 0, 1, HL_Width, 0, 1, HL_Width, HL_Depth, 1, 0, HL_Depth, 1, 0, 0, -1 del 1
line_type gs_line_type endif
! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Symbolic ! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- if iFloorPlanDisplayType = DISPLAY_SYMBOLIC then
endif
! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Outlines Only ! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- if iFloorPlanDisplayType = DISPLAY_OUTLINES then line_type gs_line_type add2 -HL_Width/2, -HL_Depth+gs_gutter_temp poly2_b 5, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0, 0, 1, HL_Width, 0, 1, HL_Width, HL_Depth, 1, 0, HL_Depth, 1, 0, 0, -1 del 1 endif
! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Overhead All ! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- if ifloorPlanDisplayType = DISPLAY_OVERHEAD_ALL then line_type overhead_line_type add2 -HL_Width/2, -HL_Depth+gs_gutter_temp poly2_b 5, 1+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0, 0, 1, HL_Width, 0, 1, HL_Width, HL_Depth, 1, 0, HL_Depth, 1, 0, 0, -1 del 1 endif
! ***************************************************************************** ! Downspout ! ***************************************************************************** if ACCUTPLANEHEIGHT < 0 or ifloorPlanDisplayType = DISPLAY_OVERHEAD_ALL then line_type overhead_line_type _frame_fill = 1+4 else line_type gs_line_type _frame_fill = 1+2+4+64 endif
CALL "m_DSProfiles" PARAMETERS gs_gutter_ds_profile_num=gs_gutter_ds_profile_num, gs_mask=0, gs_gutter_aa=gs_gutter_aa, gs_gutter_bb=gs_gutter_bb, gs_gutter_dd=gs_gutter_dd
poly2_b{2} nsp/3, _frame_fill, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0,0,0, get (nsp)
! ***************************************************************************** ! Hotspots ! *****************************************************************************
unID=gs_unID
if iFloorPlanDisplayType <> DISPLAY_SYMBOLIC then if gs_HtpsMacro=0 then HOTSPOT2 0, 0, unID : unID=unID+1 ! Hotspots not used in Downspout Complex
! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Head Leader Width ! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- add2 0,gs_gutter_temp HOTSPOT2 0, 0, unID, HL_Width2, 1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -1, 0, unID, HL_Width2, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 HL_Width2, 0, unID, HL_Width2, 2 : unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT2 0, 0, unID, HL_Width2, 1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 1, 0, unID, HL_Width2, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -HL_Width2, 0, unID, HL_Width2, 2 : unID=unID+1 del 1
! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Head Leader Depth ! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- add2 HL_Width/2,gs_gutter_temp HOTSPOT2 0, 0, unID, HL_Depth, 1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 0, 1, unID, HL_Depth, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 0, -HL_Depth, unID, HL_Depth, 2 : unID=unID+1 del 1
add2 -HL_Width/2,gs_gutter_temp HOTSPOT2 0, 0, unID, HL_Depth, 1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 0, 1, unID, HL_Depth, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 0, -HL_Depth, unID, HL_Depth, 2 : unID=unID+1 del 1 endif
! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Downspout ! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- if gs_HtpsMacro=0 then ! Hotspots not used in Downspout Complex if gs_gutter_ds_profile_num=1 then ! Round
FOR kk=1 to 4 ! --- RADIUS --- HOTSPOT2 0, 0, unID, gs_gutter_dd, 1+128, gs_gutter_dd2 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -1, 0, unID, gs_gutter_dd, 3, gs_gutter_dd2 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 gs_gutter_dd, 0, unID, gs_gutter_dd, 2, gs_gutter_dd2 : unID=unID+1 ROT2 90 NEXT kk del 4
else
HOTSPOT2 0, gs_gutter_bb, unID : unID=unID+1
! --- WIDTH --- add2 0,gs_gutter_bb HOTSPOT2 0, 0, unID, gs_gutter_aa, 1+128, gs_gutter_aa2 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -1, 0, unID, gs_gutter_aa, 3, gs_gutter_aa2 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 gs_gutter_aa, 0, unID, gs_gutter_aa, 2, gs_gutter_aa2 : unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT2 0, 0, unID, gs_gutter_aa, 1+128, gs_gutter_aa2 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 1, 0, unID, gs_gutter_aa, 3, gs_gutter_aa2 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -gs_gutter_aa, 0, unID, gs_gutter_aa, 2, gs_gutter_aa2 : unID=unID+1 del 1 add2 0,-gs_gutter_bb HOTSPOT2 0, 0, unID, gs_gutter_aa, 1+128, gs_gutter_aa2 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -1, 0, unID, gs_gutter_aa, 3, gs_gutter_aa2 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 gs_gutter_aa, 0, unID, gs_gutter_aa, 2, gs_gutter_aa2 : unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT2 0, 0, unID, gs_gutter_aa, 1+128, gs_gutter_aa2 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 1, 0, unID, gs_gutter_aa, 3, gs_gutter_aa2 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -gs_gutter_aa, 0, unID, gs_gutter_aa, 2, gs_gutter_aa2 : unID=unID+1 del 1
! --- LENGTH --- add2 gs_gutter_aa,0 HOTSPOT2 0, 0, unID, gs_gutter_bb, 1+128, gs_gutter_bb2 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 0, -1, unID, gs_gutter_bb, 3, gs_gutter_bb2 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 0, gs_gutter_bb, unID, gs_gutter_bb, 2, gs_gutter_bb2 : unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT2 0, 0, unID, gs_gutter_bb, 1+128, gs_gutter_bb2 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 0, 1, unID, gs_gutter_bb, 3, gs_gutter_bb2 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 0, -gs_gutter_bb, unID, gs_gutter_bb, 2, gs_gutter_bb2 : unID=unID+1 del 1 add2 -gs_gutter_aa,0 HOTSPOT2 0, 0, unID, gs_gutter_bb, 1+128, gs_gutter_bb2 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 0, -1, unID, gs_gutter_bb, 3, gs_gutter_bb2 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 0, gs_gutter_bb, unID, gs_gutter_bb, 2, gs_gutter_bb2 : unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT2 0, 0, unID, gs_gutter_bb, 1+128, gs_gutter_bb2 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 0, 1, unID, gs_gutter_bb, 3, gs_gutter_bb2 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 0, -gs_gutter_bb, unID, gs_gutter_bb, 2, gs_gutter_bb2 : unID=unID+1 del 1
endif endif
Symbol.Script_1D:
! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Floor Plan Display type integer definitions ! -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
DISPLAY_PROJECTED = 1 DISPLAY_OVERHEAD_PROJ = 2 DISPLAY_SYMBOLIC = 3 DISPLAY_OUTLINES = 4 DISPLAY_OVERHEAD_ALL = 5
! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! USA profiles ! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- if gs_gutter_ds_profile=`Круглый 3"` OR gs_gutter_ds_profile=`Круглый 4"` OR gs_gutter_ds_profile=`Специальный - Круглый` then parameters gs_gutter_ds_profile_num=1 endif
if gs_gutter_ds_profile=`Прямоугольный 2"*3"` OR gs_gutter_ds_profile=`Прямоугольный 3"*2"` OR gs_gutter_ds_profile=`Прямоугольный 3"*4"` OR gs_gutter_ds_profile=`Прямоугольный 4"*3"` OR gs_gutter_ds_profile=`Специальный - Прямоугольный` then parameters gs_gutter_ds_profile_num=2 endif
if gs_gutter_ds_profile=`Закругленный 2"*3"` OR gs_gutter_ds_profile=`Закругленный 3"*2"` OR gs_gutter_ds_profile=`Закругленный 3"*4"` OR gs_gutter_ds_profile=`Закругленный 4"*3"` OR gs_gutter_ds_profile=`Специальный - Закругленный` then parameters gs_gutter_ds_profile_num=3 endif
if gs_gutter_ds_profile=`Круглый 3"` then parameters gs_gutter_dd=3*0.5*0.0254 gs_gutter_dd=3*0.5*0.0254 parameters gs_gutter_dd2=gs_gutter_dd*2 gs_gutter_dd2=gs_gutter_dd*2 lock "gs_gutter_dd2" endif if gs_gutter_ds_profile=`Круглый 4"` then parameters gs_gutter_dd=4*0.5*0.0254 gs_gutter_dd=4*0.5*0.0254 parameters gs_gutter_dd2=gs_gutter_dd*2 gs_gutter_dd2=gs_gutter_dd*2 lock "gs_gutter_dd2" endif
if gs_gutter_ds_profile=`Прямоугольный 2"*3"` OR gs_gutter_ds_profile=`Закругленный 2"*3"` then parameters gs_gutter_aa=0.0254 gs_gutter_aa=0.0254 parameters gs_gutter_aa2=gs_gutter_aa*2 gs_gutter_aa2=gs_gutter_aa*2 parameters gs_gutter_bb=0.0381 gs_gutter_bb=0.0381 parameters gs_gutter_bb2=gs_gutter_bb*2 gs_gutter_bb2=gs_gutter_bb*2 lock "gs_gutter_aa2" lock "gs_gutter_bb2" endif
if gs_gutter_ds_profile=`Прямоугольный 3"*2"` OR gs_gutter_ds_profile=`Закругленный 3"*2"` then parameters gs_gutter_aa=0.0381 gs_gutter_aa=0.0381 parameters gs_gutter_aa2=gs_gutter_aa*2 gs_gutter_aa2=gs_gutter_aa*2 parameters gs_gutter_bb=0.0254 gs_gutter_bb=0.0254 parameters gs_gutter_bb2=gs_gutter_bb*2 gs_gutter_bb2=gs_gutter_bb*2 lock "gs_gutter_aa2" lock "gs_gutter_bb2" endif
if gs_gutter_ds_profile=`Прямоугольный 3"*4"` OR gs_gutter_ds_profile=`Закругленный 3"*4"` then parameters gs_gutter_aa=0.0381 gs_gutter_aa=0.0381 parameters gs_gutter_aa2=gs_gutter_aa*2 gs_gutter_aa2=gs_gutter_aa*2 parameters gs_gutter_bb=0.0508 gs_gutter_bb=0.0508 parameters gs_gutter_bb2=gs_gutter_bb*2 gs_gutter_bb2=gs_gutter_bb*2 lock "gs_gutter_aa2" lock "gs_gutter_bb2" endif
if gs_gutter_ds_profile=`Прямоугольный 4"*3"` OR gs_gutter_ds_profile=`Закругленный 4"*3"` then parameters gs_gutter_aa=0.0508 gs_gutter_aa=0.0508 parameters gs_gutter_aa2=gs_gutter_aa*2 gs_gutter_aa2=gs_gutter_aa*2 parameters gs_gutter_bb=0.0381 gs_gutter_bb=0.0381 parameters gs_gutter_bb2=gs_gutter_bb*2 gs_gutter_bb2=gs_gutter_bb*2 lock "gs_gutter_aa2" lock "gs_gutter_bb2" endif
Symbol.Script_VL:
VALUES "gs_gutter_hl_type_m" 1, 2, 3, 4, 5
VALUES "gs_gutter_ds_profile_num" 1, 2, 3 ! 1-Round, 2-Rectangular, 3-Corrugated
VALUES "gs_detlevel_3D_m" 2, 1, 0 ! Detailed, Simple, Off
! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Downspout ! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_gutter_aa" then parameters gs_gutter_aa2 = gs_gutter_aa*2 gs_gutter_aa2 = gs_gutter_aa*2 endif
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_gutter_aa2" then parameters gs_gutter_aa = gs_gutter_aa2/2 gs_gutter_aa = gs_gutter_aa2/2 endif
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_gutter_bb" then parameters gs_gutter_bb2 = gs_gutter_bb*2 gs_gutter_bb2 = gs_gutter_bb*2 endif
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_gutter_bb2" then parameters gs_gutter_bb = gs_gutter_bb2/2 gs_gutter_bb = gs_gutter_bb2/2 endif
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_gutter_dd" then parameters gs_gutter_dd2 = gs_gutter_dd*2 gs_gutter_dd2 = gs_gutter_dd*2 endif
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_gutter_dd2" then parameters gs_gutter_dd = gs_gutter_dd2/2 gs_gutter_dd = gs_gutter_dd2/2 endif
if gs_gutter_ds_profile_num=1 then !Round LOCK "gs_gutter_aa2", "gs_gutter_bb2" else LOCK "gs_gutter_dd2" endif
! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Head Lader and Downspout Prameters ! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- if gs_gutter_ds_profile_num=1 then ! Round
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "HL_Width" or GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_gutter_ds_profile" then parameters HL_Frame=(HL_Width-2*gs_gutter_dd)/2 HL_Frame=(HL_Width-2*gs_gutter_dd)/2 parameters HL_Depth=2*gs_gutter_dd+HL_Frame HL_Depth=2*gs_gutter_dd+HL_Frame parameters HL_Width2 = HL_Width/2 HL_Width2 = HL_Width/2 endif
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "HL_Width2" or GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_gutter_ds_profile" then parameters HL_Frame=(2*HL_Width2-2*gs_gutter_dd)/2 HL_Frame=(2*HL_Width2-2*gs_gutter_dd)/2 parameters HL_Depth=2*gs_gutter_dd+HL_Frame HL_Depth=2*gs_gutter_dd+HL_Frame parameters HL_Width = HL_Width2*2 HL_Width = HL_Width2*2 endif
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "HL_Frame" or GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_gutter_ds_profile" then parameters HL_Width=2*gs_gutter_dd+2*HL_Frame HL_Width=2*gs_gutter_dd+2*HL_Frame parameters HL_Width2=gs_gutter_dd+HL_Frame HL_Width2=gs_gutter_dd+HL_Frame parameters HL_Depth=2*gs_gutter_dd+HL_Frame HL_Depth=2*gs_gutter_dd+HL_Frame endif
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_gutter_dd" or GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_gutter_ds_profile" then parameters HL_Width=2*gs_gutter_dd+2*HL_Frame HL_Width=2*gs_gutter_dd+2*HL_Frame parameters HL_Width2=gs_gutter_dd+HL_Frame HL_Width2=gs_gutter_dd+HL_Frame endif
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_gutter_dd2" or GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_gutter_ds_profile" then parameters HL_Width=gs_gutter_dd2+2*HL_Frame HL_Width=gs_gutter_dd2+2*HL_Frame parameters HL_Width2=gs_gutter_dd2/2+HL_Frame HL_Width2=gs_gutter_dd2/2+HL_Frame endif
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_gutter_dd" or GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_gutter_ds_profile" then parameters HL_Depth=2*gs_gutter_dd+HL_Frame HL_Depth=2*gs_gutter_dd+HL_Frame endif
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_gutter_dd2" or GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_gutter_ds_profile" then parameters HL_Depth=gs_gutter_dd2+HL_Frame HL_Depth=gs_gutter_dd2+HL_Frame endif
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "HL_Depth" or GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_gutter_ds_profile" then parameters HL_Frame=HL_Depth-2*gs_gutter_dd HL_Frame=HL_Depth-2*gs_gutter_dd parameters HL_Width=2*gs_gutter_dd+2*HL_Frame HL_Width=2*gs_gutter_dd+2*HL_Frame parameters HL_Width2=gs_gutter_dd+HL_Frame HL_Width2=gs_gutter_dd+HL_Frame endif
else
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "HL_Width" or GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_gutter_ds_profile" then parameters HL_Frame=(HL_Width-2*gs_gutter_aa)/2 HL_Frame=(HL_Width-2*gs_gutter_aa)/2 parameters HL_Depth=2*gs_gutter_bb+HL_Frame HL_Depth=2*gs_gutter_bb+HL_Frame parameters HL_Width2 = HL_Width/2 HL_Width2 = HL_Width/2 endif
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "HL_Width2" or GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_gutter_ds_profile" then parameters HL_Frame=(2*HL_Width2-2*gs_gutter_aa)/2 HL_Frame=(2*HL_Width2-2*gs_gutter_aa)/2 parameters HL_Depth=2*gs_gutter_bb+HL_Frame HL_Depth=2*gs_gutter_bb+HL_Frame parameters HL_Width = HL_Width2*2 HL_Width = HL_Width2*2 endif
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "HL_Frame" or GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_gutter_ds_profile" then parameters HL_Width=2*gs_gutter_aa+2*HL_Frame HL_Width=2*gs_gutter_aa+2*HL_Frame parameters HL_Width2=gs_gutter_aa+HL_Frame HL_Width2=gs_gutter_aa+HL_Frame parameters HL_Depth=2*gs_gutter_bb+HL_Frame HL_Depth=2*gs_gutter_bb+HL_Frame endif
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_gutter_aa" or GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_gutter_ds_profile" then parameters HL_Width=2*gs_gutter_aa+2*HL_Frame HL_Width=2*gs_gutter_aa+2*HL_Frame parameters HL_Width2=gs_gutter_aa+HL_Frame HL_Width2=gs_gutter_aa+HL_Frame endif
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_gutter_aa2" or GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_gutter_ds_profile" then parameters HL_Width=gs_gutter_aa2+2*HL_Frame HL_Width=gs_gutter_aa2+2*HL_Frame parameters HL_Width2=gs_gutter_aa2/2+HL_Frame HL_Width2=gs_gutter_aa2/2+HL_Frame endif
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_gutter_bb" or GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_gutter_ds_profile" then parameters HL_Depth=2*gs_gutter_bb+HL_Frame HL_Depth=2*gs_gutter_bb+HL_Frame endif
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_gutter_bb2" or GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_gutter_ds_profile" then parameters HL_Depth=gs_gutter_bb2+HL_Frame HL_Depth=gs_gutter_bb2+HL_Frame endif
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "HL_Depth" or GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_gutter_ds_profile" then parameters HL_Frame=HL_Depth-2*gs_gutter_bb HL_Frame=HL_Depth-2*gs_gutter_bb parameters HL_Width=2*gs_gutter_aa+2*HL_Frame HL_Width=2*gs_gutter_aa+2*HL_Frame parameters HL_Width2=gs_gutter_aa+HL_Frame HL_Width2=gs_gutter_aa+HL_Frame endif
endif
! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! A,B,ZZYZX ! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- parameters A=HL_Width parameters B=HL_Depth parameters ZZYZX=HL_Height LOCK "A","B","ZZYZX"
! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Parameters Limites ! -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
VALUES "gs_gutter_aa" RANGE (0,) VALUES "gs_gutter_aa2" RANGE (0,) VALUES "gs_gutter_bb" RANGE (0,) VALUES "gs_gutter_bb2" RANGE (0,) VALUES "gs_gutter_dd" RANGE (0,) VALUES "gs_gutter_dd2" RANGE (0,)
if gs_gutter_ds_profile_num=1 then ! Round VALUES "HL_Width" RANGE [2*gs_gutter_dd+0.05,) VALUES "HL_Width2" RANGE [(2*gs_gutter_dd+0.05)/2,) VALUES "HL_Depth" RANGE [2*gs_gutter_dd+0.025,) else VALUES "HL_Width" RANGE [2*gs_gutter_aa+0.05,) VALUES "HL_Width2" RANGE [(2*gs_gutter_aa+0.05)/2,) VALUES "HL_Depth" RANGE [2*gs_gutter_bb+0.025,) endif
VALUES "HL_Height" RANGE [0.05,)
! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Head Leader Guard ! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- if gs_gutter_hl_guard=0 then LOCK "gs_gutter_guard_mat" if gs_gutter_hl_type_m=1 then LOCK "gs_resol" ! Type 1
! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Simple Modell ! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- if gs_detlevel_3D_m=1 then ! Simple lock "gs_gutter_hl_guard", "gs_gutter_guard_mat", "gs_resol" endif
! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! 2D Pen and Fill ! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- if gs_cont_pen= 0 then parameters gs_cont_pen=2 if gs_fill_pen=0 then parameters gs_fill_pen=91
! ***************************************************************************** ! 2D Representation ! ***************************************************************************** VALUES "floorPlanDisplayType" `Сечение и Низ`, `Сечение и Верх`, `Символический`, `Только Контуры`, `Вся Проекция` VALUES "iFloorPlanDisplayType" DISPLAY_PROJECTED, \ DISPLAY_OVERHEAD_PROJ, \ DISPLAY_SYMBOLIC, \ DISPLAY_OUTLINES, \ DISPLAY_OVERHEAD_ALL
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "floorPlanDisplayType" then iFloorPlanDisplayType = DISPLAY_OVERHEAD_PROJ if floorPlanDisplayType = `Сечение и Низ` then iFloorPlanDisplayType = DISPLAY_PROJECTED if floorPlanDisplayType = `Символический` then iFloorPlanDisplayType = DISPLAY_SYMBOLIC if floorPlanDisplayType = `Только Контуры` then iFloorPlanDisplayType = DISPLAY_OUTLINES if floorPlanDisplayType = `Вся Проекция` then iFloorPlanDisplayType = DISPLAY_OVERHEAD_ALL parameters iFloorPlanDisplayType = iFloorPlanDisplayType else floorPlanDisplayType = `Сечение и Верх` if iFloorPlanDisplayType = DISPLAY_PROJECTED then floorPlanDisplayType = `Сечение и Низ` if iFloorPlanDisplayType = DISPLAY_SYMBOLIC then floorPlanDisplayType = `Символический` if iFloorPlanDisplayType = DISPLAY_OUTLINES then floorPlanDisplayType = `Только Контуры` if iFloorPlanDisplayType = DISPLAY_OVERHEAD_ALL then floorPlanDisplayType = `Вся Проекция` parameters floorPlanDisplayType = floorPlanDisplayType endif
if iFloorPlanDisplayType = DISPLAY_PROJECTED then HIDEPARAMETER "overhead_Line_Type" endif if iFloorPlanDisplayType = DISPLAY_SYMBOLIC or iFloorPlanDisplayType = DISPLAY_OUTLINES then HIDEPARAMETER "cut_pen", "overhead_Line_Type" endif if iFloorPlanDisplayType = DISPLAY_OVERHEAD_ALL then HIDEPARAMETER "cut_pen", "gs_line_type" endif
